attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All MPs would be independent and truly represent their constituency. This would make people think before they vote instead of blindly supporting the same party every time as if they were a football team.

Once the 650 or so members were returned, they would ballot among themselves to select a Prime Minister. The PM would then choose the cabinet.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
